creator: DYNABYTES SOFTWARE HOUSE LLC
descriptionHtml:
An immersive Augmented Reality multi-player GPS adventure.

Evil stalks the streets of Dubai in this immersive and terrifying Augmented Reality multi-player GPS adventure. Join the league of hunters who must track, chase, and confront the notorious fantasmas threatening all you love.

Alone or as part of an elite crew, you will use every possible tool to triumph over evil: Deploy advanced sensors around your real-world location to expand your radar. Drive the fantasmas nearer with electromagnetic fields from the bait’s powerful tantalite core. Imprison the fantasmas in bottles of salt, iron and Lexan.

Now is the time to bring peace to your city. For if we fail, we risk an eternity of darkness – to FANTASMA.
descriptionShort: *** PLAYABLE IN DUBAI ONLY ... FOR NOW ***

appDetails.developerAddress: Office M05, Al Quoz Commercial & Offices Building, Dubai, United Arab Emirates

rated.label: PEGI 3
